name: MCBot
tagline: Minecraft username monitoring + secure admin dashboard
one_liner: Self-hosted Discord bot that tracks Mojang username availability and sends real-time alerts, with a locked-down web dashboard.
highlights: Continuously monitors Minecraft usernames via the Mojang API
Server utility suite: purge, slowmode, channel lock/unlock
Admin-only dashboard protected by Cloudflare Zero Trust

security: Cloudflare Zero Trust protects the dashboard (admin-only access).
